name: B-231
description:
B-231

An infectious radiation called B-231 has infected the town! Use your handy airgun and eliminate the problem! Move with WASD or arrow keys. Stop moving to shoot, you must line up your shoot, the cursor is only there to help! How many can you kill?

Made for Brackeys 2023.1 Jam

Theme: An End is a New Beginning

Q: Yes there are bugs

A: No I probably won't fix them anytime soon

All assets are free and not made by me except the music.

FOLLOW on Twitter @poopgames
